Synopsis:

Humphrey van Weyden (Edward Meeks), a writer, and fugitives Maud Brewster (BÃƒÂ©atrice Car-don) and George Leach (Peter Kock) have been given refuge aboard the sealer "Ghost," cap-tained by the cruel Wolf Larsen (Raimund Harmstorf). The crew mutinies against Larsen's many crimes, and though van Weyden, Maud, and George try to escape Larsen's clutches, they find themselves drawn inexorably back to him as the "Ghost" sails toward disaster. The mini-series is based on a novel by Jack London with some parts from other novels of LondonÃ‚Â´s.
